paragraphs: Esco Cell Culture Institute advances cell culture education and standards through practical training and industry collaboration.
We provide hands-on workshops, best-practice resources, and certification programs to improve laboratory quality and research outcomes.

missions.title: Hands-on Education
missions.descr: Deliver practical workshops and certified training focused on aseptic technique and contamination control.

missions.title: Accessible Resources
missions.descr: Provide clear, evidence-based resources and protocols for practitioners and researchers worldwide.

missions.title: Community Support
missions.descr: Promote collaboration across labs, institutions and industry to raise standards in cell culture practice.
